plot: A light-hearted drama serial that marks Fann Wong's first foray into the Singapore television scene. This serial focuses on three good girlfriends who live in the same apartment, as they go...
plot_en: A light-hearted drama serial that marks Fann Wong's first foray into the Singapore television scene. This serial focuses on three good girlfriends who live in the same apartment, as they go...

title: Mei meng cheng zhen
